info.title: Business Service Providers API
info.description: The Business Service Providers (BSP) API is a directory of U.S. and foreign-based businesses providing services that many small and medium sized exporters require to succeed in foreign markets Parameters.

get.description: The Business Service Providers (BSP) API is a directory of U.S. and foreign-based businesses providing services that many small and medium sized exporters require to succeed in foreign markets Parameters.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Returns business service providers for a match in the company_name, company_description, or contact_name fields.

parameters.name: ita_offices
parameters.description: Returns business service providers based on country. Enter multiple terms by separating with a comma.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Returns business service providers for a specific category. Enter multiple terms by separating with a comma.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size parameter allows you to configure the number of results to be returned up to a maximum of 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch. Unless specified the API returns 10 results at a time.

200.description: History information for the given user

company_name.description: Name of company providing the service.

company_address.description: Street, city, and country address for company.

ita_office.description: Name of ITA office that has provided company information.

category.description: Category of services that company provides.
